name: Ulead Disc Image
summary: Learn about .IXB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: IXB files may be opened in Burn.Now or DVD MovieFactory and saved as .ISO files.
NOTE: IXB files may be very large in size since they contain an entire disc image.

description: File created by Ulead DVD MovieFactory and Ulead Burn.Now, which are programs used for disc authoring and burning; contains a disc image that stores the file structure and all contents of a disc; used to burn CDs and DVDs.
